sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_e09f1c9edbc6320062e479daae961984
sys_update_xml.payload: c.scroll-wrapper { width: 100%; overflow-x: auto; white-space: nowrap; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; } .cards { margin-top: 15px; h3 { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; color: #485563; } } .modernizeit_color-square-small-gap { .scroll-wrapper { padding-bottom: 15px; display: flex; } .item { position: relative; width: 118px; flex-shrink: 0; vertical-align: top; margin-left: 8px; text-align: center; padding: 15px 5px 5px 5px; background-color: #5a889f; box-shadow: 0 8px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); white-space: normal; .sub-title { display: none; } &.out { background-color: #c0351d; .outage-alert { display: block; } } .icon img { height: 37px; } .content { margin-top: 15px; color: #FFF; } .outage-alert { display: none; position: absolute; top: 7px; svg { width: 22px; height: 22px; fill: white; } } } .item:first-child { margin-left: 0; } } .modernizeit_color-square-small-gap { .item { background-color: #323b4a; height: 118px; margin-left: 2px; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35); width: auto; flex-grow: 1; flex-basis: 0; &.out { .outage-alert { display: none; } } .name { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; } .sub-title { display: block; font-size: 14px; } .icon img { height: auto; } } }sp_instancefalsepe-recommendation-cardsfalsePE Recommendation Cards[{"name":"title","label":"title","type":"string"},{"name":"category","label":"category","type":"string"},{"hint":"","name":"items","label":"items","type":"string","choices":""},{"hint":"","name":"highlight","label":"highlight","type":"string","choices":[{"label":"empasiegel1","value":"empasiegel1"},{"label":"Office 2016","value":"Office 2016"}]}]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-04-12 18:12:48truee09f1c9edbc6320062e479daae96198472PE Recommendation Cardsglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_e09f1c9edbc6320062e479daae961984admin2017-04-13 17:52:36
